sentences.name: Anna
sentences.sentence: Where were you? You seem to be in your own world just now.

sentences.name: Will
sentences.sentence: Really? Well i was just wondering if this is a dream you know? Because it feels like a dream, spending everyday with you.

sentences.name: Narator-Participant
sentences.sentence: Anna then hits Will with the book she is reading.

sentences.name: Anna
sentences.sentence: It hurts right? That means you are not dreaming. He he
